DataElement.preferredName: Specimen KSHV Inflammatory Cytokine Syndrome Assay Collection Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not a specimen was collected for Kaposi Sarcoma-Associated Herpesvirus (KSHV) assay.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Specimen KSHV Inflammatory Cytokine Syndrome Assay Collection
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._A syndrome caused by Kaposi sarcoma-associated herpesvirus (KSHV) infection. It manifests with fever, weight loss, and fluid retention in the legs or abdomen. Patients are at risk of developing KSHV-related cancers including Kaposi sarcoma and lymphoma._A qualitative or quantitative analysis performed to determine the amount of a particular constituent in a sample or the biological or pharmacological properties of a drug._The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredName: KSHV Inflammatory Cytokine Syndrome Assay Collection
Property.preferredDefinition: A syndrome caused by Kaposi sarcoma-associated herpesvirus (KSHV) infection. It manifests with fever, weight loss, and fluid retention in the legs or abdomen. Patients are at risk of developing KSHV-related cancers including Kaposi sarcoma and lymphoma.:A qualitative or quantitative analysis performed to determine the amount of a particular constituent in a sample or the biological or pharmacological properties of a drug.:The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

Concepts.definition: A syndrome caused by Kaposi sarcoma-associated herpesvirus (KSHV) infection. It manifests with fever, weight loss, and fluid retention in the legs or abdomen. Patients are at risk of developing KSHV-related cancers including Kaposi sarcoma and lymphoma.
A qualitative or quantitative analysis performed to determine the amount of a particular constituent in a sample or the biological or pharmacological properties of a drug.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Top level term which includes Biological Markers, Risk Factors, and Prognostic Factors.
